ctu.nengoros.service.synchornous

Class SynchronousService<R,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.service.synchornous.SynchronousService<R,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - request
    E - response
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ros.node.service.ServiceResponseListener<E>

    public class SynchronousService<R,E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.ros.node.service.ServiceResponseListener<E>
    This class should generically define the synchronous ROS service. Calling synchronous service means that the request is sent, the thread waits for response (if no response received, the request is resent), if no response received after several tries, the null is returned. For example of usage, @see the vivae simulator.
